price: Ba bandi bemeye bakimukira (i Madina) ndetse bakanaharanira inzira ya Allah bakoresheje imitungo yabo na bo ubwabo, bafite urwego ruhambaye kwa Allah. Kandi abo ni bo batsinze.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīli al-lahi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim aʿẓamu darajatan ʿinda al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
